ygData.subject: Re: Ore in Oggok/Grobb
ygData.msgSnippet: not to mention there is also nowhere for evils to buy fletching supplies ... From: Brian Plexico  Unfortnunately being a smith is about
ygData.messageBody:
not to mention there is also nowhere for evils to buy fletching supplies

>>> Brian Plexico <plex@...> 6.3.99 2:22:20 PM >>>
From: Brian Plexico <plex@...>


Unfortnunately being a smith is about impossible when playing evil
characters. No one sale Skewer or Scaler molds in Neriak, Oggok, or
Grobb.

Pretty pathetic I must say. We need to email verant about this.


On Thu, 3 Jun 1999, Peanut wrote:

> From: Peanut <peanut@...>
>
>
> Is there anyone who sells scalar/skewer molds in Oggok or Grobb? It's
> frustrating enough that all the ore is in Grobb and the forge is in
> Oggok...
>
> Should I just go to Neriak to do my smithing?
>
> -Peanut
>
